member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Common.EnumerableOfIdentifiableTypeExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for type IEnumerable of 'TItem' where TItem is IIdentifiable of 'TKey'.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Common.EnumerableOfIdentifiableTypeExtensions.SingleOrDefaultByKeyAsOption``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},``1)
member.summary:
Searches the passed in enumerable collection for a single item with an Id equal to the passed in key.
If a match is found then an Option of 'TItem' instance is returned with that match. Otherwise an Option of 'TItem' whose HasValue property is false is returned.
member.typeparam: The type of the items in the enumerable collection.
The type of the identifiable key for the TItem type.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Common.EnumerableOfIdentifiableTypeExtensions.EnsureSingleMatchByKey``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},``1,System.Func{System.Exception})
member.summary:
Searches the passed in enumerable collection for a single item with an Id equal to the passed in key.
If a match is found then the match is returned. Otherwise an exception is created by executing the noMatchException delegate and that exception is thrown.
member.typeparam: The type of the items in the enumerable collection.
The type of the identifiable key for the TItem type.
member.param: A delegate that provides the exception to throw if no match is found for the passed in key.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.MediaTypeFormatters.AllPropertiesResolver
member.summary: Currently the HypermediaResource abstract class needs to be decorated with DataContract attribute for proper XML serialization. By default, the JSON serializer ignores properties not decorated with DataMember attribute when a resource class (or its base ) has DataContract attribute defined on it. The class includes ignored properties in serialization back.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.MediaTypeFormatters.HalJsonFormatter.HalJsonParser
member.summary: Parses HAL JSON

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.MediaTypeFormatters.HalJsonFormatter.HalJsonParser.Parse(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Parses HAL JSON. Because it doesn't really make sense to do anytihng with Hypermedia that is POSTed back to the server, we don't really care about deserializing to a HypermediaResource, we just care about deserializing to a transport object so we only use an object parser and not parsers to parse links or embedded resources. If this changes, replace this parser with a new one that deals with the hypermedia.
member.param: String representation of HAL JSON request content body.
member.returns: A deserialized obejct of the requested type.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.MediaTypeFormatters.HalJsonFormatter.HalJsonObjectParser
member.summary: Parses a transport object from a request body.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.MediaTypeFormatters.HalJsonFormatter.HalJsonObjectParser.GetObject(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a transport object from a HAL JSON request body.
member.param: String representation of HAL JSON request content body.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.RequestContextExtensions.EnsureRelatedResourceKeyIsPresent``2(IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.IRequestContext,System.String)
member.summary:
Ensures that a related resource of type TRelatedResource is available in the context's UriParameters.
If it is available then the TRelatedResource's key value is returned. If it is not available then an HttpResponseException is thrown with a status code of HttpStatusCode.BadRequest.
member.typeparam: The type of the desired related resource.
The type of the related resource's key.
member.param: The context used to obtain resource info.
The error message for the HttpResponseException.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.ResourceCreationResult`2
member.summary: Class representing the result of ApiApplicationService.Create() call.
member.remarks: The class is used to return a key or whole resource depending on particular case: - some of the RQ4 creation operations return whole created object, so it can be mapped and sent back, - some operations return just id of created entity and we should call apiservice.Get() to send created resource back.

member.summary: Filters the resources by related resource key if the key exists in Uri parameters.
member.typeparam: type of sequence resource
type of related resource
type of key of related resource
member.param: selects a key property which value is compared to Uri parameter of related resource
member.returns: filtered sequence if Uri parameter for given related resource type was found. Otherwise, the input sequence.
